abstract: Pete Wells reviews Wassail restaurant in Lower East Side.
lead_paragraph: Hard cider — 12 on tap and a hundred in bottles — is the real passion on Orchard Street.

headline.main: At Wassail on the Lower East Side, in Praise of Smashed Apples
headline.print_headline: Let Us Now Praise Crushed Apples

snippet: Hard cider — 12 on tap and a hundred in bottles — is the real passion on Orchard Street.
